raw_body:
DIAS BANDARANAYAKE – nee DE SILVA SITA – Relict of late Dennister Dias Bandaranayake,​ Veterinary Surgeon,​ precious mother of Chamintha,​ mother-in-law of Neilhaan De Fonseka,​ loved daughter of late R.C. De Silva,​ Attorney-at-Law,​ Kurunegala and late Brenda De Silva. A private funeral was held on Saturday,​ 2nd March 2024 according to her wishes.
016362
